articles.author: Mared Gruffydd
articles.title: 'Surprising' photos of Queen show how 'happy and playful' she was - 'a free spirit' - Express
articles.description: Queen Elizabeth II was forced to have her photograph taken hundreds, if not thousands of times. But Her Majesty's personal adviser and curator, Angela Kelly, has shared a time when the Queen was allowed to pose and be photographed how she liked - in a way nob…
